title: SNAQ - Diabetes Food Tracker
description: Discover the ultimate solution for managing diabetes with SNAQ, the leading diabetic carb counter, diabetes tracker, and diabetes food tracker. Effortlessly track your meals by snapping a picture to get detailed nutritional values. Gain valuable insights on how your meals affect your glucose levels and find patterns to improve your Time-in-Range. SNAQ integrates with popular glucose sensors and diabetes apps, making it the perfect companion for anyone managing diabetes. 🍽️ Snap & Track: Take a picture of your meal to instantly get nutritional information. 📊 Diabetes Insights: Understand how different foods impact your diabetes management. 📈 Pattern Discovery: Identify trends to improve your Time-in-Range. 🩸 Sensor Integration: Seamlessly connect with glucose monitors, diabetes apps and glucose blood sugar trackers. 🔗 User-Friendly: Designed for easy and intuitive use by anyone managing diabetes. SNAQ takes the guesswork out of managing diabetes. With our comprehensive diabetes tracker and diabetes food tracker, you can monitor your health and adjust your diet accordingly to help your glucose blood sugar tracker. The diabetic carb counter feature helps you keep track of carbohydrate intake, making meal planning easier and more effective. Whether you're at home or dining out, SNAQ provides you with the tools you need to stay on top of your health. Experience the convenience and reliability of the best diabetes app available. Our A.I.-powered diabetes food tracker and diabetes tracker make managing diabetes simpler by counting carbs, protein, and fat content through just a picture. The diabetic carb counter helps you understand how your meals impact your diabetes and improve by identifying patterns from past tracking. SNAQ integrates with top glucose blood sugar tracker apps, including Dexcom, FreeStyle Libre, Contour, and more, to provide a comprehensive view of your diabetes. Log your meals from our extensive food database, view post-meal data, add notes for future reference, and track your activity easily with SNAQ diabetes food tracker. Upgrade to the Premium version for a more comprehensive experience with unlimited meal tracking and insights, reminders for checking your health, and photos for carb counting, all within the diabetes food tracker. Features: • TRACK your health with ease using the diabetes food tracker and diabetic carb counter • DISCOVER how your meals affect your diabetes with the diabetic carb counter • IMPROVE your diabetes management and help your glucose blood sugar tracker by identifying food and health tracking patterns using the diabetes food tracker and diabetic carb counter SUITABLE FOR: • Diabetes tracking • Diabetes food tracker • Diabetes log Integrations: • Data import supported from glucose blood sugar trackers: Dexcom, FreeStyle Libre, and Contour, seamlessly integrated with the diabetes food tracker DETAILS: • Nutrition tracker and food diary for all meals • Extensive food database to log meals with the diabetes food tracker and diabetic carb counter • Post-meal data for each meal • Easy meal copying • Barcode scanner • Filter meals by data and time frame • Search past meals • Activity tracker • Notes for future reference • Supports glucose monitor units mg/dL and mmol/L Support: We're thrilled to have you on board! Since the creation of SNAQ, our goal has been to help people make more data-driven decisions at mealtime and improve their health using the diabetes food tracker and diabetic carb counter. Your feedback is important to us, so don't hesitate to contact us at support@snaq.io Disclaimer: The information provided by SNAQ is for informational purposes only and should not be used for medical decisions. Always consult a trained physician before making any decisions regarding your health.
